$interpreted: Pang: Master Yan-Bo, I heard about it from Puggi. Is Hestia alright?
Yan-Bo: She's fine.  Currently drinking over there, she is.
Hestia: ...The prince I've been waiting for ten years turned out to be a piece of fish crap. There's no justice in this damn world!
Pang: Does this really count as "fine"?
Yan-Bo: With Time's injurious hand crush'd and o'erworn, what is love? 'Tis not hereafter...
Yan-Bo: Pain from naive ignorance, gradually heal her, time will. Watch over her by her side, all we need to do.
Pang: Master, the two verses you just recited sound weird...
Yan-Bo: Eh, gotten two poems mixed together once more, have I? So careless, I am.
Pang: I don't think careless is the right word when Master seems to do it all the time...
Cecil: They're right here. Surround them!
Puggi: You heartless bastard again!
Cecil: Shut up! I've brought every soldier that is available to the Vincent Family here.
Cecil: Today, not only will I take the mermaid away, but I'll also go to frogodile territory, skin those frogodiles and sell their skins!
Puggi: How dare you, you vicious brute!
Cecil: And you. The "exquisite delicious creature" the lizard nobles are paying a high price for looks exactly like you. You're not getting away either!
Puggi: Season 2 is right around the corner, yet we still have people who remember this crap?
Yan-Bo: Young fella, so persistent, why bother?
Cecil: You don't understand how I feel! Ever since father passed away, those nobles who suffered loses because of us all came back to suppress me.
Cecil: I sustained the family all by myself, surviving one day at a time. Although I was able to hold on until now, I'm running out of money...
Pang: And you're going to sacrifice Hestia just because of that?
Cecil: What else? I was the one who let her go in the past. Her life belongs to me in the first place.
Cecil: As long as I can sell her, the family can hold on for a while longer!
Hestia: Y, you are the worst...I'll stand right here. If you have what it takes to capture me, go ahead!
Cecil: You really think I wouldn't dare? Everybody, get her!
Cecil: Impossible...why are you so strong...
Hestia: For ten years, I have been waiting for that prince.
Hestia: Whenever I felt lonely and sad, I would try to piece together his most perfect side using my blurry image of him...
Cecil: Damnit, don't come near me; or else, don't blame me for what's going to happen...
Hestia: Why can't you just let me keep dreaming? Why do you have to let me know the horrible truth?
Hestia: Why do you have to destroy the image of the prince I have in my mind!
Cecil: She transformed? Everyone, get her! We must capture her no matter what!
Hestia: SCREW OFF! Don't you ever show your ugly face in front of me again!
Cecil: M-Maple Lake is filled with monsters...RUN!
Puggi: Hearty Hestia, why did you transform?
Hestia: I-I don't know...
Yan-Bo: Of mermaids from the eastern borders, a special thing I have heard.
Yan-Bo: Once they overcome emotions of strong sorrow, change, their appearance will. Sign of adulthood for mermaids too, this is.
Hestia: Does this mean that I am a mature female now?
Hestia: However, I never expected that becoming an adult would be so painful...
Yan-Bo: Both joy and sadness, part of growth they are, in the first place.
Yan-Bo: Joy and sadness, savor them one bite at a time. That way, become a better person, you will.
Pang: Certainly. In the future, there will definitely be a proper prince waiting for you. Don't give up now!
Hestia: You have a point. I'm so beautiful and charming. I definitely deserve a better prince!
Platypus: Kekekeke!
Hestia: What? Karnulla and his goons are harrassing you guys again? Damnit, I'll teach him a lesson!
Yan-Bo: See, as I told you. Fine, she is.
Pang: Yes~

Model.Text: Master Yan-Bo, I heard about it from Puggi. Is Hestia alright?
She's fine.  Currently drinking over there, she is.
...The prince I've been waiting for ten years turned out to be a piece of fish crap. There's no justice in this damn world!
Does this really count as "fine"?
With Time's injurious hand crush'd and o'erworn, what is love? 'Tis not hereafter...
Pain from naive ignorance, gradually heal her, time will. Watch over her by her side, all we need to do.
Master, the two verses you just recited sound weird...
Eh, gotten two poems mixed together once more, have I? So careless, I am.
I don't think careless is the right word when Master seems to do it all the time...
They're right here. Surround them!
You heartless bastard again!
Shut up! I've brought every soldier that is available to the Vincent Family here.
Today, not only will I take the mermaid away, but I'll also go to frogodile territory, skin those frogodiles and sell their skins!
How dare you, you vicious brute!
And you. The "exquisite delicious creature" the lizard nobles are paying a high price for looks exactly like you. You're not getting away either!
Season 2 is right around the corner, yet we still have people who remember this crap?
Young fella, so persistent, why bother?
You don't understand how I feel! Ever since father passed away, those nobles who suffered loses because of us all came back to suppress me.
I sustained the family all by myself, surviving one day at a time. Although I was able to hold on until now, I'm running out of money...
And you're going to sacrifice Hestia just because of that?
What else? I was the one who let her go in the past. Her life belongs to me in the first place.
As long as I can sell her, the family can hold on for a while longer!
Y, you are the worst...I'll stand right here. If you have what it takes to capture me, go ahead!
You really think I wouldn't dare? Everybody, get her!
Impossible...why are you so strong...
For ten years, I have been waiting for that prince.
Whenever I felt lonely and sad, I would try to piece together his most perfect side using my blurry image of him...
Damnit, don't come near me; or else, don't blame me for what's going to happen...
Why can't you just let me keep dreaming? Why do you have to let me know the horrible truth?
Why do you have to destroy the image of the prince I have in my mind!
She transformed? Everyone, get her! We must capture her no matter what!
SCREW OFF! Don't you ever show your ugly face in front of me again!
M-Maple Lake is filled with monsters...RUN!
Hearty Hestia, why did you transform?
I-I don't know...
Of mermaids from the eastern borders, a special thing I have heard.
Once they overcome emotions of strong sorrow, change, their appearance will. Sign of adulthood for mermaids too, this is.
Does this mean that I am a mature female now?
However, I never expected that becoming an adult would be so painful...
Both joy and sadness, part of growth they are, in the first place.
Joy and sadness, savor them one bite at a time. That way, become a better person, you will.
Certainly. In the future, there will definitely be a proper prince waiting for you. Don't give up now!
You have a point. I'm so beautiful and charming. I definitely deserve a better prince!
Kekekeke!
What? Karnulla and his goons are harrassing you guys again? Damnit, I'll teach him a lesson!
See, as I told you. Fine, she is.
Yes~
